In this section it will be explain how to create a document archetype inside an existing archetype repository, to learn about archetype repository creation and structure check the section 'Create an archetype repository'. Specific information about adding properties and traces can be found in their sections.
Proteus application use the same syntax to store objects and documents. Documents are objects of class `:Proteus-document`. In order to create a document archetype you can copy a document archetype folder from the repository documents directory or create one from an empty folder.
